title: Cormyr: A Novel
description: The breathtaking, epic story of the greatest nation in the Forgotten Realms. As Azoun IV, crowned head of Cormyr, lies dying from an assassin's ambush, the political and magical forces of the nation spar to determine the country's future. Agasint the backdrop of impending catastrophe, the history of Cormyr and its ruling family is revealed.
author: Ed Greenwood
